snippet.title: Princess Maker Refine for Steam - Teaser
snippet.description:
The Original Story of 8 years with your beloved daughter
The Origin of 「Lifetime Simulation Game」 reincarnate in a refined shape

The Princess Maker Series
The 「Princess Maker」 has introduced the concept of 「raising your own daughter」 as the first lifetime simulation game featuring an interesting story which depicts adopting a 10 year old girl and raising her to be a fully grown lady and still hold long-lasting and firm fandom. With the phenomenal success of the first 「Princess Maker」 seeds birth of 「Princess Marker 2」, which brought the huge scale of public success on and the serial success stories has been carved alongside the Princess Maker afterwards. 

Fully Refined Visuals & Audios
Princess Maker Refine is reincarnated by the Graphical makeover of turning original 16-Color Graphics to re-touched full color supervised by Original author Takami Akai san. This work led by classical charms will now turn more lovely with vivid beauty. Voice dubbing also arrived as new addition to the gaming experience in hopes you will be more connected to your lovely daughter.

Raise your daughter with love
You are the hero who saved a kingdom on the verge of eternal ruin by evil entities. Weary by mass genocides and destruction, you decide to adopt an orphan. From this day forward, you are the father of a beautiful young girl.

Dream of your daughter to become a beautiful princess
You must raise a naive young girl into a gorgeous woman. Fortunes of your daughter is all up to your endeavors. The affection and dreams will come to fruition one day.



©GAINAX / ©CFK
Developed and Published by CFK Co., Ltd.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pm2refine
